U. S. Electoral College
Popular Vote Totals

Candidate vote totals are as listed on each state's Certificate of Ascertainment. Cumulative totals are also as listed on, or derived from, each state's Certificate of Ascertainment. The highest number is highlighted.

(Romney / Ryan) Libertarian Party

(Johnson / Gray) Green Party

(Stein / Honkala*) Others

* In Illinois, Jill Stein's running mate was Howie Hawkins. In Indiana, no Green Party vice presidential candidate was filed. In Wisconsin, Jill Stein's running mate was Ben Manski.

** New York vote totals by party: Democratic Party, 4,018,385; Working Families Party, 141,056; Republican Party, 2,145,628; Conservative Party, 256,171; Green Party, 37,826; Party for Socialism and Liberation, 1,902; Libertarian Party, 45,200; Constitution Party, 6,106.
